title: Definition of Vertical Compression
text: What does vertical compression mean? Do we multiply a number to the $$x$$ value or the $$y$$ value?

title: Vertical Compression of a Single Point
text: If we vertically compress $$(4,3)$$, what does the new $$y$$ value of this point become( in fractions)?

title: Apply to all points
text: Now perform the operation of the single point for all the othe points too.
